text.section: In addition to the powers of the Corporation under subsection (a) of this section, for the purpose of funding the purchase or condemnation by the State for public use of the property as authorized by §§ 11-520 and 11-521 of the Business Regulation Article, the Corporation may borrow money and issue bonds to finance the cost of acquiring by purchase or completing the condemnation process by the State in accordance with applicable legal standards.
